reviewText:
I love this movie, and when I head that it was getting a deluxe steelbook from Synapse, I had to get it.
The art on the steelbook looks awesome, and there are a ton of extras packed into this release.
My favorite though is the paper replica of character Sally's birthday party invitation.
It's quirky extras like this that make me love this Synapse release.
Any loyal horror movie fan or argento fan will love this. Cool tin case with great art. I loved it.

demons 2 blu ray
this release is absolutly amazing! the transfer is better than i would have ever expected. such a treat to watch one of the greatest horror films ever made with this much clarity. the special features and also very good! if your a fan of the demons series than this blu ray won't let you down.
